TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void FormViewInsertEventHandler(object sender, FormViewInsertEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed FormViewInsertEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub FormViewInsertEventHandler(sender As Object, e As FormViewInsertEventArgs)
public delegate void FormViewInsertEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, FormViewInsertEventArgs ^ e);
type FormViewInsertEventHandler = delegate of obj * FormViewInsertEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发事件的插入按钮时 (与按钮及其`CommandName`属性设置为"插入") 在控件内单击时，之前控件插入记录。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，如 HTML 编码或每次此事件发生时在数据源中插入前验证的记录的值的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding or validating the values of a record before inserting it in the data source, whenever this event occurs. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式添加委托给事件的控件。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventHandler/CS/formviewinsertedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventHandler/VB/formviewinsertedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式添加委托给事件的控件。The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertEventArgs/CS/formviewinserteventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertEventArgs/VB/formviewinserteventargsvb.aspx#1)]
